snippet: D. James Dee, known as the SoHo Photographer, spent nearly four decades documenting work by modern artists. Now he’s giving away his sprawling archive.
abstract: Photographer D James Dee is retiring and giving away trove of transparencies and negatives documenting work of almost every important artist of last 40 years, as well as installations at some of the most influential galleries; Dee is having hard time finding takers, since archive is large and completely unlabeled.
lead_paragraph: D. James Dee, known as the SoHo Photographer, spent nearly four decades documenting work by modern artists. Now he’s giving away his sprawling archive.

headline.seo: D. James Dee Plans to Give Away His Modern Art Archive
headline.main: He Captured Modern Art, and Now Is Letting It Go
headline.print_headline: He Captured Modern Art, And Now Is Letting It Go
